SorcererLevel2Spells.Name: Alter Self
SorcererLevel2Spells.Description: You assume a different form.

SorcererLevel2Spells.Name: Blindness/Deafness
SorcererLevel2Spells.Description: You can blind or deafen a foe.

SorcererLevel2Spells.Name: Blur
SorcererLevel2Spells.Description: Your body becomes blurred, shifting and wavering to all who can see you.

SorcererLevel2Spells.Name: Darkness
SorcererLevel2Spells.Description: Magical darkness spreads from a point you choose within range.

SorcererLevel2Spells.Name: Darkvision
SorcererLevel2Spells.Description: You touch a willing creature to grant it the ability to see in the dark.

SorcererLevel2Spells.Name: Detect Thoughts
SorcererLevel2Spells.Description: You gain insight into the thinking of one creature.

SorcererLevel2Spells.Name: Enhance Ability
SorcererLevel2Spells.Description: You touch a creature and bestow upon it a magical enhancement.

SorcererLevel2Spells.Name: Enlarge/Reduce
SorcererLevel2Spells.Description: You cause a creature or object you can see within range to grow larger or smaller for the duration.

SorcererLevel2Spells.Name: Gust of Wind
SorcererLevel2Spells.Description: A line of strong wind 60 feet long and 10 feet wide blasts from you in a direction you choose.

SorcererLevel2Spells.Name: Hold Person
SorcererLevel2Spells.Description: The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration.

SorcererLevel2Spells.Name: Invisibility
SorcererLevel2Spells.Description: A creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends.

SorcererLevel2Spells.Name: Knock
SorcererLevel2Spells.Description: Choose an object that you can see within range.

SorcererLevel2Spells.Name: Levitate
SorcererLevel2Spells.Description: One creature or object of your choice that you can see within range rises vertically, up to 20 feet, and remains suspended there.

SorcererLevel2Spells.Name: Mirror Image
SorcererLevel2Spells.Description: Three illusory duplicates of yourself appear in your space.

SorcererLevel2Spells.Name: Misty Step
SorcererLevel2Spells.Description: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.

SorcererLevel2Spells.Name: Scorching Ray
SorcererLevel2Spells.Description: You create three rays of fire and hurl them at targets within range.

SorcererLevel2Spells.Name: See Invisibility
SorcererLevel2Spells.Description: For the duration, you see invisible creatures and objects as if they were visible.

SorcererLevel2Spells.Name: Shatter
SorcererLevel2Spells.Description: A sudden loud ringing noise, painfully intense, erupts from a point of your choice within range.

SorcererLevel2Spells.Name: Spider Climb
SorcererLevel2Spells.Description: Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch gains the ability to move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and upside down along ceilings, while leaving its hands free.

SorcererLevel2Spells.Name: Suggestion
SorcererLevel2Spells.Description: You suggest a course of activity (limited to a sentence or two) and magically influence a creature you can see within range that can hear and understand you.

SorcererLevel2Spells.Name: Web
SorcererLevel2Spells.Description: You conjure a mass of thick, sticky webbing at a point of your choice within range.
